info.name: OffiLibre - OffiDocs LibreOffice Online
info.description: OffiLibre - OffiDocs LibreOffice Online allows to create and edit word documents, xls preadsheets and ppt presentations. It is an integration with a LibreOffice Online host solution deployed in http://www.offidocs.com
info.summary: Edit office documents directly in your browser.
info.author: OffiDocs
